text:
If you'd like...
Would you come talk with me outside...?

(I was planning to do some training but...
 I don't really have a good reason to refuse that offer)

Sure,
Fuyu also wanted to talk with Mano some.

Howaaah...
Mr. Sun is so nice and warm...

Yeah,
the sunlight feels good, doesn't it.

Since the training camp is so full of lessons,
it feels like ages since we've relaxed like this.

Not that I dislike lessons
or anything like that...

Yeah, don't worry,
I understand what you meant, Mano-chan.

Fuyu is also very relaxed right now.
Maybe it's because Mano is with me?

Fufu, that tired, huh?
Take your time and rest.
